item.title: Smashing Your SANS Course
item.description: Introduction If you’re reading this post, you likely know of the SANS course and GIAC certification.

item.title: SOARing by the seat of your pants
item.description: There’s a lot of hype with Security Orchestration, Automation and Response (SOAR) and on paper it basically sells itself.
